backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister handling user profiles, homework, timetable entries, and quiz progress with access control and custom Day and TimeSlot modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping sparkle-related UI features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing concise summaries of many frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint containing root div and script loader for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Initializes TanStack Router and QueryClient and wraps the app in the SceneProvider.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting users for their display name and saving it via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/common/BigAction: Large styled button component supporting icons, variants, and disabled state.
frontend/src/components/common/EmptyStat: Displays an empty-state message with icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorStat: Error UI component with icon, message, and optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingSt: Centered loading spinner with optional message text.
frontend/src/components/common/NavCardBu: Clickable navigation card with icon, label, and luxury-themed styling.
frontend/src/components/common/ScreenHea: Header bar with optional back/home buttons and sparkle-styled title.
frontend/src/components/common/SparkleOv: Provides layered sparkle and glitter overlays with optional corner accents, respecting reduced-motion settings.
frontend/src/components/scene/ScenePicke: Renders a selectable grid of scene cards and updates the active scene in context.
frontend/src/components/scene/SceneThumb: Displays a scene image with graceful fallback UI on load failure.
frontend/src/contexts/SceneContext.tsx: Manages the selected scene with persistence, validation, and utilities for resolving scene image URLs.
frontend/src/data/quizData.ts: Defines a quiz question interface and provides a list of simple quiz questions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's reduced-motion preference via a media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend CRUD operations for user profiles, homework, and timetable entries using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSceneBackground.ts: Preloads the selected scene's background image and returns either the image style or a fallback color.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus utility classes for backgrounds and gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and renders the root App component.
Implements a math quiz game where kids solve addition problems with scoring and feedback.
Runs a shape-matching game where players identify and click the correct shape to earn points.
frontend/src/pages/games/GirlyGame1Scree: Provides a word‑spelling game where players build target words letter by letter to increase score.
frontend/src/pages/games/GirlyGame2Scree: Implements a memory‑matching game with emoji cards, tracking moves and completion state.
frontend/src/pages/GamesHubScreen.tsx: Displays a themed game selection screen with scene backgrounds and category cards for different games.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Home dashboard showing user greeting, navigation cards, authentication checks, and profile setup handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomeworkScreen.tsx: CRUD interface for homework items with add, edit, delete, and completion toggling using React Query.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Login UI using Internet Identity with loading states, error handling, and a decorative card layout.
frontend/src/pages/QuizScreen.tsx: Interactive quiz flow with intro, question answering, results saving, and animated themed UI.
frontend/src/pages/TimetableScreen.tsx: Displays and manages timetable entries with create, update, and delete dialogs, grouping entries by day and requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/WelcomeScreen.tsx: Shows the app welcome screen with branding and a button that navigates to login.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the app’s full TanStack Router route tree, mapping paths to screen components including home, login, homework, timetable, games, and individual game routes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including persistence and hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, shadows, radii, and plugin integrations for a stylized theme.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s design goals, known issues, and required sparkly luxury visual features, including needed image assets and feature requests.
